description: Try our easy to follow Layered Zuccotto Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Layered Zuccotto Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 350 g double layer unfilled sponge cake

recipeInstructions.text: Bring the plastic wrap up and fold over the top to seal. Place onto a plate and refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight. To serve, remove plastic wrap and dust with cocoa.
